entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:43 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 2:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: E 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to rain near midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
